Audits.pick_right_metrics: How to pick the right metrics? →
Audits.webpagetest_select_date: Choose the date of the audit
Audits.webpagetest_select_dates: Choose the dates of the audits
Audits.lighthouse_note: Note: data provided by Lighthouse may differ from the Dashboard data. This is due to a different audit environment. Diagnostics and opportunities are still relevant, even though the indicated metric improvements may differ from the real results.

WPTMetricFirstViewTTI.name: TTI - Time To Interactive (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewTTI.description: Triggered when CPU computations and network requests are few and far between (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewTTI.name: TTI - Time To Interactive (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewTTI.description: Triggered when CPU computations and network requests are few and far between (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewSpeedIndex.name: Speed Index (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewSpeedIndex.description: Triggered when pixels of the page reach their final position (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewSpeedIndex.name: Speed Index (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewSpeedIndex.description: Triggered when pixels of the page reach their final position (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewFirstPaint.name: First Paint (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewFirstPaint.description: Triggered when the first pixel is drawn on the screen (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstPaint.name: First Paint (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstPaint.description: Triggered when the first pixel is drawn on the screen (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.name: First Meaningful Paint (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.description: Triggered when the “hero” element of the page (a big element at the top center) is visible (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.name: First Meaningful Paint (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstMeaningfulPaint.description: Triggered when the “hero” element of the page (a big element at the top center) is visible (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewLoadTime.name: Load Time (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewLoadTime.description: Triggered when network is quiet and page is fully loaded (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewLoadTime.name: Load Time (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewLoadTime.description: Triggered when network is quiet and page is fully loaded (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewFirstContentfulPaint.name: First Contentful Paint (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewFirstContentfulPaint.description: Triggered when the first DOM element (text, image, ...) is drawn on the screen (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstContentfulPaint.name: First Contentful Paint (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewFirstContentfulPaint.description: Triggered when the first DOM element (text, image, ...) is drawn on the screen (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewTimeToFirstByte.name: Time to First Byte (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewTimeToFirstByte.description: Triggered when the browser receives the first byte from the server, usually HTML (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewTimeToFirstByte.name: Time to First Byte (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewTimeToFirstByte.description: Triggered when the browser receives the first byte from the server, usually HTML (when coming back to website)

WPTMetricFirstViewVisuallyComplete.name: Visually Complete (First View)
WPTMetricFirstViewVisuallyComplete.description: Triggered when 100% of the pixels on the page reached their final position (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricRepeatViewVisuallyComplete.name: Visually Complete (Repeat View)
WPTMetricRepeatViewVisuallyComplete.description: Triggered when 100% of the pixels on the page reached their final position (for the first visit on website)

WPTMetricLighthousePerformance.name: Lighthouse Performance Score
WPTMetricLighthousePerformance.description:
Aggregates many of other performance metrics, simulates middle-end device & poor network conditions.
Measured via Dev Tools or https://web.dev/fast
